project_description: Full renovation of an 8x10 ft bathroom in a 1990s home to create a modern space with a walk-in shower (replacing tub/shower combo), double vanity, and heated floor, including fixture/electrical/plumbing upgrades, new finishes, and all associated demo and construction.
key_considerations: Potential need to relocate or reconfigure plumbing for double vanity and walk-in shower
Material choices (tile, vanity, fixtures, etc.) will significantly impact cost
Existing plumbing located on north/west walls; layout feasibility subject to site confirmation
Heated floor system requires electric upgrades and careful substrate prep

estimate_items.description: Demolition and haul away of existing fixtures, tile, vanity, tub/shower, and flooring
estimate_items.assumptions: Standard construction, no hazardous material (asbestos, lead)

estimate_items.description: Rough plumbing modifications and relocation (supply/drain) for double vanity and walk-in shower
estimate_items.assumptions: No slab work needed; accessible framing behind walls
estimate_items.notes: Includes rough-in drains, supply lines, and p-traps

estimate_items.description: Install new shower pan, waterproofing, modern wall tile, glass enclosure, and shower fixtures (walk-in)
estimate_items.assumptions: Mid-range tile (not custom stone), glass enclosure is standard size
estimate_items.notes: Includes pan, curb, tile, waterproofing, fixtures, and glass

estimate_items.description: Install heated flooring system with digital thermostat, new tile flooring, and leveling as required
estimate_items.assumptions: Mid-range porcelain or ceramic tile, standard electric radiant system
estimate_items.notes: Includes heating mat, electrical connection, and tile installation

estimate_items.description: Supply and install double vanity, plumbing fixtures, solid surface countertop, mirrors, and storage (medicine cabinet/linen tower)
estimate_items.assumptions: Prefabricated double vanity, standard faucet sets, mid-range mirrors, no custom cabinetry
estimate_items.notes: Includes labor, sink/faucet supply, and light plumbing adjustments

estimate_items.description: Electrical upgrades: new GFCI outlets, vanity lighting, shower light, new ceiling fan/vent, radiant floor wiring
estimate_items.assumptions: Sufficient amperage available at panel, no rewiring of entire room
estimate_items.notes: Code-required GFCI, includes switches and minor patching

estimate_items.description: Finish carpentry, painting, trim work, drywall repair, and final accessory installation (towel bars, TP holder, etc.)
estimate_items.assumptions: Standard drywall, paint, basic trim, standard accessories
estimate_items.notes: Includes all finish labor, caulk, and touchups

estimate_items.description: Miscellaneous/project management, permits, site prep, contingencies
estimate_items.assumptions: Assumes standard local permit fees and project management
estimate_items.notes: Allows for minor surprises and project administration

next_steps: Conduct a detailed site visit to verify existing plumbing and framing conditions
Finalize desired layout with client and provide layout drawings
Assist client in selecting specific materials and fixtures (tile, vanity, glass, etc.)
Confirm electrical load and plan for in-floor heat
Prepare detailed construction schedule and finalize quote
missing_information: Exact desired layout (positions of vanity, shower, toilet relative to existing plumbing)
Electrical panel information (capacity for radiant floor)
Any structural issues (framing rot, subfloor condition)
Confirmation of code requirements in jurisdiction (permits, vent fans, lighting)
key_risks: Hidden conditions behind walls/floors (water damage, mold, structural issues) increasing scope/cost
Plumbing relocations more extensive than anticipated
Cost overruns from premium material selections
